posts.post_title: FS T-206 Ty Cobb Red Portrait SGC40
posts.post_content:
Hi,

I am selling this cobb card. I am asking 925.00 delivered.
I had this on ebay and the buyer did not complete the transaction.
He stated a friend logged into his account and bid on several items, just my luck one of them was mine.

If you are interested please email me at :
[url]mantle52topps@sbcglobal.net[/url]

I will be putting it on ebay this evening if nobody wants it...


[IMG]http://i420.photobucket.com/albums/pp290/mantle52topps/002-15.jpg[/IMG]

Sold...

Thank you all for looking..
